name: Red Measures
description:
Red Measures is single player first person zombie shooter with procedural generating rooms. Each passage of the game will be different from the previous one. In this game you going to survive in dark corridors of the Soviet Bunker. You will have unique guns & tools to help you with hordes of mutants that will come from nowhere and other dangers of the bunker.



FIND THE TRUTH
After a failed experiment, hordes of mutants filled the labyrinths of a secret military laboratory, they tear everything in their path, stopping at nothing.
You are Major Volkov, one of the best agent of the Soviet Union was sent to deal with this incident and to clear the bunker captured by monsters on the lower floors of which the professor is hiding from behind which it all started.

But the lower you go, the more difficult and confusing the labyrinths of the bunker become, and there is less hope of finding the right path.

  • Destroy Hordes Of Monsters
  • Find the right way out of the procedurally generated floors
  • Meet face to face with professor

Hope Dies Last...
